CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 16, 1962, pg. 22, reads: "Alpha Wives' Fete - The success of the swank bridge luncheon given by the Alpha Wives, last Saturday, at Hotel Webster Hall, was largely due to the work of the above committee... A small portion of the large crowd can be seen in next photo.  Former Pittsburgher Mrs. Natalie Fox Holmes is pictured smiling in the left foreground. - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Women, including Natalie Fox Holmes on left in foreground, and Constance Randall on foreground right, seated in groups of four at card tables, playing bridge, in Webster Hall for the Alpha Wives annual bridge luncheon
